HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Update 2.5.0
New Class: o Shadow - half-breed demons with an affinity for shadow magic and a talent for combat that makes them perfect assassins.
New Mod Options: o Players can now adjust how common fighters and mages are for each faction type.
Tweaks: o Improved performance.
--See mod discord announcements for all the update details! - https://discord.gg/ksksHj --
